full_summary:
# Installation, Repair and Moving Services - Vancouver Region
### Solicitation Number: 1000244533-B
### Amendment Number: 1

The Department of Indigenous Services Canada (ISAC), British Columbia Region is seeking installation, repair and moving services for owned and leased furniture and equipment within the region on an as-needed basis. The services will be performed at 1138 Melville Street, Vancouver, BC V6E 4S3.

### Tender Details
- **Tender Closing Date:** 12 March 2024, at 14:00:00 hours
- **Service Period:** The Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) will be for a period of three (3) years with an additional two (2) one-year option periods under the same terms and conditions.
- **Location of Work:** 1138 Melville Street, Vancouver, BC V6E 4S3
- **Service Requirements:** Installation, repair and moving services for owned and leased furniture and equipment, including removal of surplus, e-waste, and recycling, and delivery to designated recycling facilities within the Greater Vancouver Area.

### Solicitation Status
This solicitation is a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) competition under the Solicitation Number 1000244533-B (CB-216-70293708) held on 20 February 2024. Although the RFSO was initially planned for a one-year term, amendments have resulted in a three (3) year Standing Offer Agreement.

### Exclusions
Security requirements do not apply to the solicitation.

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
Christine Madore, Indigenous Services Canada (ISAC)
christine.madore@sac-isc.gc.ca
873.354.1376

### Tender Documents
The solicitation documents are available online at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32372/1000244533-b_rfso.pdf

### Note
Please note that this solicitation is set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. For more information, refer to Annex 9.4 of the Supply Manual.
